org.vedantatree.expressionoasis.extensions

Class DefaultVariableProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vedantatree.expressionoasis.extensions.DefaultVariableProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VariableProvider

    public class DefaultVariableProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements VariableProvider
    This is the default implementation of the variable provider.
    Version:
    1.0 Modified to use HashMap rather than Hashtable for performance reasons. I think this is safe to do, but may need to reverse if thread-safety issues are encountered., 1.1
    Author:
    Parmod Kamboj, Mohit Gupta, Kris Marwood
